question:
[Melissa] was happy to babysit her niece, [Machelle]. [Machelle] was a great child. [Harry] and his brother [Kenneth] always played pranks on each other [Morgan] had to work a double shift and needed someone to watch her son [Donald]. Luckily his sister [Danielle] was free. [Danielle] was excited because today she was going to the zoo with her uncle [Brian]. [Kenneth] and his brother [Harry] like to tease their sister [Valerie]. [Valerie]'s other brother, [Brian], does n't tease her. [Machelle] and her brother [Victor] enlisted in the army [Victor] got his son, [Harry], a car for his birthday.
Question: How is [Melissa] related to [Morgan]?
